name: ALPHA (CASH CASCADE)
objective: Maximize cash velocity. Close low-friction deals immediately to fund operations while advancing enterprise contracts.

deals.description: Membership upgrade opportunity - Premium tier conversion
tactics: Issue "Buy Now" link immediately
Send final invoice with scarcity messaging
Use deadline: "Pricing locks at midnight"
No nurturing - direct close only
Issue "Buy Now" link immediately
Send final invoice with scarcity messaging
Use deadline: "Strategy session slots filling fast"
No nurturing - direct close only

deals.description: Paid audit request from diagnostics company
tactics: Leverage regulatory deadline pressure
Message: "Audit schedule is filling. Confirm by [Date] to secure Q4 delivery."
Emphasize compliance timeline urgency
Offer priority scheduling for immediate commitment

deals.description: Finalize proposal for BioTech Solutions regulatory audit package
tactics: Finalize proposal immediately
Send with urgency messaging
Follow up within 24h

tactics: Finalize proposal immediately

deals.description: Contract negotiation MedDevice Inc - 3yr SaaS subscription
deals.blockerRemovalTactic: Map the decision chain. Identify exactly who or what is stopping the signature today.
tactics: Identify signature blocker (Legal? Budget? Champion absence?)
Generate specific removal tactic for that blocker
Escalate to executive sponsor if needed
Offer contract flexibility to remove friction
